sentences.en: A photomultiplier can amplify the signal to detectable levels.
sentences.cn: 光电倍增管可将此讯号放大到可侦测的程度.

sentences.en: Contrarily , in 10 inflammation and 10 normalbronchial mucosa no detectable MG - Ags were found.
sentences.cn: 10例肺部炎症和10例正常粘膜MG─AgS则均为阴性.

sentences.en: Dark matter gives out no light and is detectable only because of its gravitational effect on visible matter.
sentences.cn: 暗物质不发光，它之所以能被发现，只是因为它对可见物质产生引力作用。

sentences.en: Doctors say the disease is probably inherited but not detectable at birth.
sentences.cn: 医生说该疾病可能是遗传而来，但在出生时无法查出。

sentences.en: For example, leaner people have more detectable brown fat than overweight people.
sentences.cn: 例如, 瘦人与超重者相比有更多可检测的棕色脂肪.

sentences.en: Grains containing detectable amounts of aflatoxin should therefore not be used for food or feed.
sentences.cn: 因此,凡测出含有阿夫罗毒素的谷物都不能做粮食或饲料.

sentences.en: It is miniscule, hardly detectable, even by the finest of your instruments.
sentences.cn: 它是非常小的,就算使用你们最精良的仪器也很难检测得到.

sentences.en: Objectives: To improve the detectable rate of cervical lesions.
sentences.cn: 目的: 为提高子宫颈病变的检出率.

sentences.en: Primary plaques were detectable in 16 to 20 hours.
sentences.cn: 在16到20小时内可查出原发溶斑.

sentences.en: The infestation of avocado root rot disease is not visually detectable.
sentences.cn: 鳄梨树根腐病的感染用视觉是无法探测出来的.

sentences.en: The inflection point at this PH is barely detectable.
sentences.cn: 在此PH值下,拐点不易发现.

sentences.en: The magnetite in our brains can a detectable fingerprint.
sentences.cn: 我们大脑的磁场能作为可检测的指纹.

sentences.en: The noise is barely detectable by the human ear.
sentences.cn: 人的耳朵几乎是察觉不到这种噪音的。

sentences.en: These trace gases are not detectable by smell in any but the most heavily polluted atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 这些微量气体除了在污染最严重的大气外,是不能凭嗅觉察觉到的.

sentences.en: To propose one publicly detectable watermarking plan using error correcting code.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种采用纠错码的可以公开检测的水印方案.

words.tran_cn: 侦查，探测；发觉，发现；察觉

trans.tran_en: Something that is detectable can be noticed or discovered
